doc.repnme: Transcript of fifty-seventh special meeting of Executive Directors, held on Thursday, August 27, 1953 : South Africa - Second Transport and Second Electricity Supply Commission (ESCOM) Projects
doc.abstracts: This partial transcript, from the session of the Executive Directors held on Thursday, August 27, 1953, covers only two proposed loans for the Second Transport Project and the Second Electricity Supply Commission (ESCOM) Project. In addition to covering the details of the loans and the creditworthiness of the borrowers, the meeting touched on the issue of interracial tensions in South Africa and the possible effects on repayment prospects. At this meeting, the Executive Directors resolved to approve both loans.
